data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 3,643 believers living in Central Abaco, Bahamas.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Central Abaco, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Central Abaco.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Central Abaco, Bahamas honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,643 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Central Abaco, Bahamas to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Central Abaco, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 9,200 souls in Central Abaco and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
